quoteText:
You must be age 13 or older.
While we are thrilled to see brilliant young coders get excited by learning to program, we must comply with United States law.
GitHub does not target our Service to children under 13, and we do not permit any Users under 13 on our Service.
If we learn of any User under the age of 13, we will terminate that Userâ€™s Account immediately.
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
